page.title: 07HOUSING AROUND THE AIRPORT
page.content: The area covered is sparsely populated with 12{farmhouses distributed evenly throughout the area. In the South West,{converted}RAF {buildings}provide residential accommodation,which has changed little from the outside, but contains an hotel, old-people's home and halls of residence for students of Teesside Polytechnic. Outside the airport grounds,the former officers'quarters are now modernised{private}detached and semi- detached{homes. There has been no large scale post- war development except for a few private{bungalows}built on small plots of farmland, close to the country road sides.
